Text: It was a foolish decision.

I had vowed to protect Lady Elisabeth, but Crimson
snatched her away. Because I refused to drink blood,
I wasn't powerful enough to protect her.
Since you've protected the queen, I'll spare you.

A thousand years from tonight, I hope you will join
us as an ally.

And now, he plans on using her again to fulfill his
ambitions.

I don't know how I could face her if I let the same
tragedy of a thousand years ago play out once more...

But that's everything. I'm not human. I'm a vampire.
And I'm sorry for keeping that from you...
I'm no different.
See, I might be one of the possessed.
*gasp*

I had the symptoms when I was a child. Eventually,
I'll become a monster...

I brought my brother to this town, hoping he'd prove
himself before it's too late for me.

And now, because of that...if anything were to
happen to him, I don't think I'd be able to forgive
myself...
...Claire
...Hey.

I find it hard to believe that the Haven was really
all a fantasy. Can't you just try again?
I don't want to make the same mistake again.

I see... Well, if you're not going to save her,
I will. If we kidnap her and wait for the Red
Moon to end, she shouldn't go on a rampage.
But Claire...why go to such lengths?

Once this Red Moon is over, we can wake her up.
Then you two can talk it over.
But...I'm certain Queen Elisabeth just wants to die.
You won't know that till you ask!

And it'd be too sad for things to just end like this.
You'd be sad, Elisabeth would be sad, and all those
dead people would be sad...

Your Haven wasn't just some fantasy. That's what I
believe anyway.

So, let's go beat up Crimson and kidnap your sleeping
queen.
...Claire
Thank you.
And we'll make sure to save your brother too.
I'll masterfully pull that off. Don't butt in.
Uh, okay...
With that, the two of them resume their ascent.

The sacrifice has been prepared, and the moon is
waxing scarlet.
Hehehehe...
At long last, the time is finally here...

The time to revive Elisabeth the Blood Queen is
finally here.

After a thousand years, all that's left of the
Progenitor is her heart. As long as it remains,
though, she can still be resuscitated. That's just
how Progenitors are.

Though time may wear away your flesh and bones,
leaving only your heart, your beauty remains.

It's been too long, my Blood Queen... Everything is
in place for you to bathe the world in blood...
Let us paint the world red once again.
On a night befitting us,

drenched in the crimson hue of fresh blood and
terror...

Crimson fits the Blood Queen's heart in the
sacrificial flesh.
Hehehehe!

It will take a little longer for the revival to begin.
Crimson knows he needs to leave for some time.

The Blood Queen will be starving when she awakens,
and she'll attack man and vampire alike. He won't be
able to get closer until she settles down a bit.
Arise!
My beloved Queen!
